item.title: Drew add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "If you can dream it, you can do it. Always remember that this whole thing was started with a dream and a mouse." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Drew add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The earth laughs in flowers." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Drew add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Drew add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Drew add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Drew add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "History dressed up in the glow of love’s kiss turned grief into beauty." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Oh what a wonderful soul so bright inside you. Got power to heal the sun’s broken heart, power to restore the moon’s vision too." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "This is what our love is––a sacred pattern of unbroken unity sewn flawlessly invisible inside all other images, thoughts, smells, and sounds." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Un-winged and naked, sorrow surrenders its crown to a throne called grace." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Your pain is a school unto itself–– and your joy a lovely temple." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Even when muddy your wings sparkle bright wonders that heal broken worlds." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "The same hot lightning that burns your blood with passion–– cools your fears with peace." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "The American identity has never been a singular one and the voices of poets invariably sing, in addition to their own, the voices of those around them." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Poetry, like jazz, is one of those dazzling diamonds of creative industry that help human beings make sense out of the comedies and tragedies that contextualize our lives." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Compassion crowns the soul with its truest victory." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Feet sandaled with dreams tread paths of vision leading to wisdom’s sharp peaks." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Love, Mercy, and Grace, sisters all, attend your wounds of silence and hope." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Everywhere we shine death and life burn into something new…" -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "An outrageous instinct to love and be loved blinded your arms to lines of propriety––Women and Men, Christians and Jews, Muslims and Buddhists, white, black, red, brown. An outrageous instinct to love and be loved executed your brain every hour on the hour." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "In my head this cruel unspeakable truth: that we battled and we cursed and we spilled each other’s blood, we relished our taste of hell and strangled heaven’s love." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "First steps are always the hardest but until they are taken the notion of progress remains only a notion and not an achievement." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "I place my fingers upon these keys typing 2,000 dreams per minute and naked of spirit dance forth my cosmic vortex upon this crucifix called language." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "With its leaves so rich and heavy with elation and its crimson face made brighter with visions of divinity the shadow of a certain rose looks just like an angel eating light." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Dreams dress us carefully in the colors of power and faith." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Hope drowned in shadows emerges fiercely splendid–– boldly angelic." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "This rose of pearl-coated infinity transforms the diseased slums of a broken heart into a palace made of psalms and gold." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Poetry looking in the mirror sees art, and art looking in a mirror sings poetry." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Drew add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl
